section.heading: Exemption from certification.
section.text: No certification of immunization shall be required for the admission to a school of a student:

para.text: For whom the responsible person objects in good faith and in writing, to the chief official of the school, that immunization would violate his or her religious beliefs; or
For whom the school has written certification by a private physician, his or her representative, or the public health authorities that immunization is medically inadvisable.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 38-502 and § 38-504.
